entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
